events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop has a noticeable scratch on the screen and some keys are not responding.
The issue has been identified as a product defect based on the customer's description of physical damage and malfunction.
Assigning the case to our technical support agent specialized in hardware issues for further assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I'll do my best to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch on the screen and the keyboard so we can assess the damage more clearly?
Attached are several photos showing the scratch across the screen and the keyboard where some keys wonâ€™t register.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement unit, as I need the laptop for work and can't wait for a refund process.
We have arranged a replacement unit to be shipped to you immediately with expedited delivery at no extra cost.
Just checking in to confirm that the replacement laptop arrived in good condition and meets your expectations.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything is working perfectly. Thank you for your quick help!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now, and please contact us anytime if you need assistance.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about your support experience.
